text:
Taxation Administration Amendment Order 2005

I make the following order under section 79A of the Taxation Administration Act 1997 .

20 June 2005

P. A. LENNON

Treasurer

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Taxation Administration Amendment Order 2005 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Taxation Administration Order 2003 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Taxation Administration Order 2003 .

5.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Taxation Administration Order 2003 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 29 June 2005

This order is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
